changeSet.sql: DO ' DECLARE BEGIN IF (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''${tenantname}_mod_consortia'' AND table_name = ''pc_tenant_request'')) THEN INSERT INTO ${tenantname}_mod_consortia_keycloak.pc_tenant_request ( id, pc_id, tenant_id, status, request_url, request_payload, response, response_status_code, completed_date, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) SELECT id, pc_id, tenant_id, status, request_url, request_payload, response, response_status_code, completed_date, created_by, created_date, updated_by, (CASE WHEN updated_date IS NULL THEN created_date ELSE updated_date END) as updated_date FROM ${tenantname}_mod_consortia.pc_tenant_request; END IF; END; ' LANGUAGE plpgsql;
